Package com.Game.observer

Class LogEntryBuffer

java.lang.Object
com.Game.observer.LogEntryBuffer
public class LogEntryBuffer extends Object
LogEntryBuffer class acts as the Observable in the Observer pattern. It maintains a list of log entries and notifies observers when new entries are added.
